levels.description:
Consumes <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP and <@ba.vdown>200</> HP to launch a Self-Driving Recon Cart in the direction this unit is deployed
<@ba.rem>After launching, the Self-Driving Recon Cart moves in a straight line until it runs into impassable area. When passing a friendly unit, it will change its direction according to that unit's deployment direction (Once per unit)</>
